thread.title: ConnectSolutions Presents Free Webinar: Bridge the Gap to the Cloud with Adobe Connect
thread.title_full: ConnectSolutions Presents Free Webinar: Bridge the Gap to the Cloud with Adobe Connect

author: admin
title: ConnectSolutions Presents Free Webinar: Bridge the Gap to the Cloud with Adobe Connect
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 1:41 PM Companies mentioned in this article: ConnectSolutions 
SAN FRANCISCO, Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- ConnectSolutions (CoSo), the trusted professional and managed solutions provider for Adobe Connect and Adobe Gold Solution Partner, today announced a new webinar designed to help organizations avoid the typical obstacles encountered when expanding collaboration, eLearning, and webinars into the cloud with Adobe Connect. The webinar will take place October 14 at 11 a.m. PT / 2 p.m. ET. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151012/276077LOGO 
Tweet This : CoSo Presents Free Webinar: Bridge the Gap to the Cloud with #AdobeConnect http://bit.ly/1MbkA9X via @CoSoCloud 
Many companies already depend on Adobe Connect to reach their collaboration, web meeting, and eLearning goals thanks to its rich feature set and high level of customization. Typically, these companies buy Adobe Connect and initially decide to deploy it in their own data centers, tasking their operations teams to manage it. Often, this seems to work well initially, but as usage goes up, it becomes more time consuming to manage the necessary infrastructure and reliability issues begin to arise. Inevitably, these organizations look to the cloud, but researching and deciding on the right strategy can take months. 
CoSo Product Manager Sean Morrison will help organizations find a quicker path by presenting the many options for cloud deployment and associated services to help organizations decide on the implementations that are right for them. He will also share some of the challenges faced and solutions created for some of the world's most well-known companies, including SAS, General Motors, KPMG, US Department of State, and the Learning Tree International, as they moved their own eLearning and collaboration tools to the cloud. 
An Adobe Connect ecosystem veteran and long-time product lead at ConnectSolutions, Sean Morrison is a seasoned Adobe Connect expert. For the past five years he's helped build and deliver Adobe Connect value to CoSo customers. 
Please join CoSo in learning how to successfully move Adobe Connect to the cloud. To register, please click here . 
Connect with ConnectSolutions: -- ConnectSolutions Blog -- LinkedIn -- Twitter 
About ConnectSolutions ConnectSolutions (CoSo), a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner and Adobe Gold Solution Partner, is the trusted private-cloud solutions provider for Microsoft Skype for Business and Adobe Connect. With more than 8 billion minutes of cloud collaboration delivered, CoSo products, services, and unrivaled expertise are relied upon by mid-market businesses, global enterprises and government agencies to deliver a superior customer experience in the deployment and ongoing management of mission-critical collaboration solutions. 
The CoSo Suite of managed service offerings exceed the security, reliability and quality requirements of typical collaboration systems and are trusted by such commercial organizations as General Motors, KPMG, Citibank and Raytheon as well as such government organizations as the General Services Administration, FEMA, and the Transportation Security Administration. 
For more information about ConnectSolutions and the CoSo Cloud offerings, visit: http://connectsolutions.com 
Contact: Chris Blake
